topics.body:
"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c952c6368723fac630200#post_548c952c6368723fac630200
Has Nerd3 ever heard of Stockholm Syndrome?
For the record, I don't think such a tape is really an appropriate thing to put in a game, despite the fact it's meant to shock the viewer and make the villain more despicable.
He is however, reaching social justice levels of whining with that post. Especially with how it ended.

But hey, this is a man who thinks pissing off fans of a franchise deliberately is funny and thinks Metal Gear Rising is shit because it was different to Metal Gear Solid when he thought it would be the same.

Stereotypes are my greatest berserk button, yes.
